channel.title: Can't attack some npcs. (teamtorva source and client)
channel.description: Im using the teamtorva source and client and i couldnt trade so i replaced my click buttons with(wont fit so i will put in comment when someone replies) trading works but i cant attack torm demons and frost dragons and stuff is this related and how can i fix it?

item.title: Can't attack some npcs. (teamtorva source and client)
item.dc:creator: @louisdemon louisdemon
item.description:
@louisdemon wrote:

sorry my bad go to
data/cfg/npc.cfg
search torm demon ID
change HP value btw 1-2000.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't attack some npcs. (teamtorva source and client)

item.description:

There isnt an hp value there maxhit attack and defence

item.title: Can't attack some npcs. (teamtorva source and client)
item.dc:creator: @louisdemon louisdemon
item.description:
@louisdemon wrote:

change the healt to minimum 1
it’s probably seted to 0 why you can’t attack them.
to do this go in spawn-config.java search torm demon ID i think it’s 8359 or 8356
change the HP value btw 1-1000.

Read full topic
